Title: Relates to surcharges assessed for the late filing of rent registration statements
Summary: Relates to surcharges assessed for the late filing of rent registration statements; provides that a late filing surcharge shall be one hundred dollars; provides that if the state division of housing and community renewal determines such late registration was willful the surcharge shall be one thousand dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง12-a, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to surcharges assessed for the late filing of rent registration statements
